NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: Friends, the forge has asked for one more shipment of ore to be delivered to <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color>. Let us work quickly to complete this last shipment!
2
1
CYCAD: Isn't the construction of <color=lightblue>Ash Twin's</color> protective shell complete? What will this new shipment of ore be used for?
3 2
COLEUS: Why, in the construction of the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> of course!
4 3
COLEUS: Even though it was formed here, the ore still requires treatment at <color=lightblue>Hollow's Lantern</color> to reach its full capabilities.
5 4
CYCAD: That is sooner than I'd thought! Has a suitable site for the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> been chosen already?
6
5
COLEUS: Indeed! We have chosen a site in the planet's underground pools, where one of the quantum shard travels.
7
6
CYCAD: In that case, we will need to put extra eyes into carefully reinforcing the walls of the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> to protect it from groundwater.
8
7
CYCAD: Has the need for a new warp receiver been communicated to Poke yet? The warp receiver must be installed before the structure can be sealed!
9
8
OENO: That won't be necessary, Cycad! The new type of projection stone invented by Daz should allow us to work without a warp receiver.
10
9
CYCAD: What? But warp transmitters require a connected warp receiver to function! How will anyone enter the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> without a warp receiver to warp them inside?
11
10
OENO: You should visit the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> to learn about Daz's invention, Cycad - it will allow us to access the sealed space without a warp system entirely!
12
11
CYCAD: If it means the <color=orange>Sanctuary's</color> construction will be more expedient, I have absolutely no qualms! When shall we begin our work?
13
12
COLEUS: I am glad to hear your enthusiasm as always, my young apprentice.
14
13
COLEUS: Is everyone rested up? Then we shall begin our work shortly!
Campsite EX1 14
Campsite EX1.5 10
SY R2 9
SY R3 1
SY R4 6
Workshop R1 11
